overview: A young newlywed couple from America returns to Geneva to visit Marcel's home town. Once there he is informed of his former lover's suicide and in turn is subjected to threats that accuse him of being responsible for her death and further, threaten his new fiancée's life. George Hilton plays a peculiar neighbor with voyeuristic tendencies who has an obsession with Deborah.
tagline: Riddle, riddle, Debbie in the middle. Surprise, surprise, guess who dies?
title: The Sweet Body of Deborah
